Author: tentaclebarn
Text: yeah, i just feel kinda fat :/// but hey what else is new i guess

Author: GlassSnowdrops
Text: Before anorexia I used to be *starving* every time I was ill and pretty much ate whatever I felt like, because I'm a drama queen when I'm not feeling well and food distracted me. I wouldn't say I binged but I definitely ate more than normal. Never gained from it, it always faded once I was healthy again. I'd say it probably had something to do with dehydration. Stay hydrated and eat what your body asks for, it knows what it needs right now. Hope you feel better soon!
